lexUnit.name: acquit.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: formally declare not guilty of a criminal charge

sentence.text: On March 6 , 1997 , a jury acquitted Otegi in the deaths of Inaki Mendiluze and Jose Luis Gonzalez .
A Broward County jury acquitted Ruddock of a charge that he ripped a diamond ring off Alexandra Williams ' finger at the fighter 's home two years ago .
DEDHAM , Massachusetts ( AP ) --- Boston Red Sox first baseman Mo Vaughn was acquitted on a charge of drunken driving after a two-day trial .

KUALA LUMPUR , Fri. - The Sessions Court today acquitted the managing director of Intrakota Consolidated Berhad of a charge of allowing the company 's bus to emit excessive smoke .

ROME ( AP ) --- A court here Saturday acquitted former Italian Premier Bettino Craxi of corruption charges in connection with alleged kickbacks for work on the Rome subway system .

A MOTHER accused of trying to turn herself into a human fireball because she had been rejected by the boss she loved , wept yesterday as a jury acquitted her of attempted arson .

The Contemporary Arts Centre of Cincinnati was acquitted of obscenity on Oct. 5 for having displayed an exhibition of photographs by the late Robert Mapplethorpe .
FORMER Liverpool City Council deputy leader Derek Hatton and two other people were yesterday formally acquitted of one charge of conspiring to defraud the city council .
